mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.column_name AS columnName, a.column_comment AS columnComment, a.data_type AS columnType, a.IS_NULLABLE isNull, a.COLUMN_KEY isKey, a.COLUMN_DEFAULT defaultValue, a.table_name AS tableName, a.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH AS columnLength, b.table_comment AS tableComment FROM information_schema.columns a RIGHT JOIN information_schema.tables b ON a.table_name = b.table_name WHERE b.table_schema = #{dbName} AND a.table_name = #{tableName}
SELECT table_name AS tableName, table_comment AS tableComment FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE table_schema = #{databaseName}
